channel.title: CVE Feed for Sprecher Automation -- SPRECON-E
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sprecher Automation -- SPRECON-E

item.title: CVE-2024-6758|2024-08-13T20:19:35.263Z -- sprecher%20automation -- sprecon-e
item.description: Improper Privilege Management in Sprecher Automation SPRECON-E below version 8.71j allows a remote attacker with low privileges to save unauthorized protection assignments.
